title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.23 - Court's waiver of compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.23 - Court's waiver of compliance

State Regulations

In any civil or criminal cause, the
court, either upon its own or upon any party's motion and either with or
without notice to the adverse parties, may waive compliance by any party with
any provision of this Part or may vary the application of any such
provision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
670.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
